ygData.subject: Tounge quest in Kaladim..and Pegleg's Leg
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wondering if anybody knew the details on either one of these quests. When I give the guy neer the mines in Kaladim the tounges..he just sais..something
ygData.messageBody:
I was wondering if anybody knew the details on either one of these quests.
When I give the guy neer the mines in Kaladim the tounges..he just
sais..something about what are these?..well..im keeping them..or something
like that, but nothing happens. Do i need to give him certain tounges or
what? everybody in Kaladim judges me warmly or amiably, but I can't get him
to talk anymore about the quest.

Also,
I have been running around with Pegleg's leg for a while..It is starting to
smell...could someone give me some info on this quest?


Chrisstauf of the Lightbringers
cleric of the 14th circle
Karana server
